EmailTemplate.name: ASI GiftBox Request Reject
EmailTemplate.subject: Gift Box request {!ASI_GiftBox_Request_Header__c.Name} has been rejected
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Gift Box request ({!ASI_GiftBox_Request_Header__c.Name}) has been rejected.
Please click on the link {!ASI_GiftBox_Request_Header__c.Link} to review.
